title: Perusall
text: incorporates an e-book reader with collaborative annotation tools and valuable teaching resources. It includes social networking features, interactive note-taking, assignment creation and seamless syncing with Canvas.
featureText: Perusall is an innovative educational tool designed to enhance learning through social interaction. Its primary feature, social annotation, allows students to comment on texts within a shared digital space, fostering an engaging and interactive learning environment. By enabling collaboration, students can discuss concepts, ask questions, and provide feedback in real time, directly on the course material.

features.title: Interactive Social Learning
features.text: Transform coursework into a social experience, enhancing engagement and critical thinking. Students interact on assignments, fostering intrinsic motivation and deeper understanding.

features.title: Collaborative Learning Environment
features.text: Facilitate student interaction and understanding through questions, comments, and opinions on course materials. Perusall enables synchronous and asynchronous discussions, preparing students for class.

features.title: Scalable Community Building
features.text: From small seminars to large lecture courses, Perusall builds a sense of community across disciplines and course modalities. Instructors can seamlessly continue community engagement even with shifts in course format.
